oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Map of the Battle of Horseshoe Bend
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Map detailing the battle at Horseshoe Bend during the Creek War (1813-1814).

The Battle of Horseshoe Bend was fought on March 27, 1814, between the warring faction of the Creek Indians and American forces led by General Andrew Jackson. The battle resulted in the near destruction of the Creek warriors and is considered to be the climactic action of the Creek War.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Wall, Bernhardt, 1872-1956
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:instructionalMethod: 2.36; 4.49; 8.43; War of 1812; Growth of the Republic
